name: ARGeoTrackingStatus
desc: The state, accuracy, and reason that are possible for geo-tracking’s current condition.

items.name: var state: ARGeoTrackingStatus.State
items.desc: A value that describes the session’s current geo-tracking state.

items.name: enum ARGeoTrackingStatus.State
items.desc: Values that are possible for the current state of geo-tracking.

items.name: var stateReason: ARGeoTrackingStatus.StateReason
items.desc: The reason for the frame’s geo-tracking state.

items.name: enum ARGeoTrackingStatus.StateReason
items.desc: The reasons for the app's geotracking status.

items.name: var accuracy: ARGeoTrackingStatus.Accuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of geo tracking at the time the session captured the frame.

items.name: enum ARGeoTrackingStatus.Accuracy
items.desc: Values that are possible for the current accuracy of geo tracking.
